recipes.name: Classic Cheeseburger
recipes.description: Juicy beef patty topped with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles on a sesame seed bun.
instructions: Form ground beef into a patty and season with salt and pepper.
Grill or fry patty until cooked to desired doneness.
Toast hamburger bun on the grill.
Assemble burger with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Traditional Italian pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C).
Roll out pizza dough and place on a baking sheet.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is melted.
Top with fresh basil leaves before serving.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
recipes.description: Creamy pasta dish with grilled chicken, Alfredo sauce, and Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Cook fettuccine pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.
In a saucepan, heat Alfredo sauce until warm.
Add grilled chicken slices to the sauce and simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Drain pasta and toss with Alfredo sauce.
Serve hot garnished with grated Parmesan cheese and fresh parsley.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Asparagus
recipes.description: Healthy and flavorful grilled salmon fillet served with roasted asparagus.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush salmon fillets and asparagus with olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper.
Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side until cooked through.
Grill asparagus for 2-3 minutes until tender.
Serve salmon and asparagus hot with lemon slices.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: Simple and refreshing salad with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.
ingredients: Balsamic glaze, olive oil, salt, and pepper
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate.
Layer with fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately as a side dish or appetizer.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Homemade cookies with gooey chocolate chips, perfect for dessert or snack.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a large bowl, cream together butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until smooth.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla.
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until edges are golden brown.
Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Mexican street food classic with seasoned beef, salsa, lettuce, and cheese.
instructions: In a skillet, brown ground beef over medium-high heat until no longer pink.
Add taco seasoning and water according to package instructions.
Simmer until sauce thickens.
Heat taco shells in the oven according to package instructions.
Fill taco shells with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
Serve hot with additional toppings if desired.

recipes.name: Pasta Primavera
recipes.description: Delicious pasta dish with assorted vegetables and creamy Alfredo sauce.
instructions: Cook penne pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.
In a large skillet, sauté broccoli, bell peppers, mushrooms, and cherry tomatoes until tender-crisp.
Add cooked penne pasta and Alfredo sauce to the skillet.
Toss gently until pasta and vegetables are coated with sauce.
Serve hot garnished with fresh basil leaves.

recipes.name: Mango Sticky Rice
recipes.description: Thai dessert with sweet sticky rice topped with ripe mango slices and coconut sauce.
instructions: Rinse glutinous rice until water runs clear. Drain well.
In a saucepan, combine coconut milk and sugar. Bring to a simmer over medium heat.
Add glutinous rice and stir. Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for 20 minutes or until rice is tender and coconut milk is absorbed.
Remove from heat and let it sit covered for 10 minutes.
Serve sticky rice topped with mango slices and sprinkle with toasted sesame seeds.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Classic salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
ingredients: 1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large bowl, toss romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing until evenly coated.
Add croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately as a side dish or add grilled chicken for a main course.

recipes.name: Homemade Pizza Margherita
recipes.description: Classic Italian pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves.
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out pizza dough and place on a pizza stone or baking sheet.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a border for the crust.
Arrange mozzarella cheese slices over the sauce.
Drizzle olive oil over the pizza and season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Top with fresh basil leaves before serving.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi
recipes.description: Garlicky shrimp sautéed in butter and white wine sauce, served over pasta.
ingredients: 1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook linguine pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.
In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add shrimp to the skillet and cook until pink, about 2 minutes per side.
Pour in white wine and lemon juice. Bring to a simmer and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Stir in chopped parsley and season with salt and pepper.
Serve shrimp and sauce over cooked linguine.

recipes.name: Beef Stir Fry
recipes.description: Quick and flavorful beef stir fry with vegetables in a savory soy sauce.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
instructions: In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, garlic, cornstarch, and water to make the sauce.
Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat.
Add beef slices and stir fry until browned. Remove from skillet.
Stir fry vegetables until crisp-tender.
Return beef to skillet and pour sauce over the mixture.
Cook until sauce thickens and coats the beef and vegetables.
Serve hot over cooked rice.

recipes.name: Tiramisu
recipes.description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
instructions: In a mixing bowl, beat mascarpone cheese, heavy cream, and sugar until smooth.
Quickly dip each ladyfinger into the cooled espresso and arrange in a single layer in a serving dish.
Spread half of the mascarpone mixture over the ladyfingers.
Repeat with another layer of dipped ladyfingers and mascarpone mixture.
Cover and refrigerate tiramisu for at least 4 hours or overnight.
Before serving, dust with cocoa powder.

recipes.name: Vegetable Curry
recipes.description: Spicy and aromatic vegetable curry with mixed vegetables in a coconut milk base.
instructions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Sauté onion and garlic until softened and fragrant.
Add mixed vegetables and curry powder. Cook for 5 minutes.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer until vegetables are tender and sauce thickens.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

recipes.name: Chocolate Cake
recipes.description: Moist and decadent chocolate cake with rich chocolate frosting.
ingredients: For frosting: 1/2 cup unsalted butter, 2/3 cup cocoa powder, 3 cups powdered sugar, 1/3 cup milk, 1 tsp vanilla extract
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour two 9-inch round baking pans.
In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla extract. Beat on medium speed for 2 minutes.
Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin).
Pour batter into prepared pans.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Cool cakes in pans for 10 minutes, then remove from pans and cool completely on wire racks.
For frosting: In a medium bowl, beat butter until creamy. Add cocoa powder, powdered sugar, milk, and vanilla extract. Beat until smooth and spreadable.
Frost and assemble cake layers. Enjoy!

recipes.name: Sushi Rolls
recipes.description: Japanese sushi rolls filled with fresh fish, avocado, cucumber, and sushi rice.
ingredients: 2 cups sushi rice, cooked and seasoned
1/2 lb sushi-grade fish (salmon, tuna, etc.), sliced into strips
Soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger for serving
instructions: Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat.
Spread a thin layer of sushi rice over the nori, leaving a 1-inch border at the top.
Arrange fish, avocado, and cucumber along the bottom edge of the rice.
Roll the sushi tightly using the bamboo mat, sealing the edge with water.
Slice sushi roll into bite-size pieces with a sharp knife.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Refreshing salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, red onion, olives, and feta cheese in a lemon-oregano dressing.
ingredients: For dressing: 1/4 cup olive oil, 2 tbsp fresh lemon juice, 1 clove garlic, minced, 1 tsp dried oregano, Salt and pepper to taste
instructions: In a large bowl, combine tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, olives, and feta cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, dried oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine.
Garnish with fresh oregano leaves before serving.
Serve chilled as a side dish or light meal.

recipes.name: Beef Wellington
recipes.description: Elegant British dish with tender beef filet, mushroom duxelles, and puff pastry.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Season beef tenderloin with salt and pepper. Sear on all sides until browned.
In a skillet, sauté mushrooms, shallot, and garlic in butter until mushrooms release their liquid and mixture is thickened.
Roll out puff pastry and spread with Dijon mustard.
Spread mushroom mixture over the pastry, leaving a border.
Place seared beef tenderloin in the center and wrap pastry around it, sealing edges.
Bake for 25-30 minutes until pastry is golden and beef is cooked to desired doneness.
Let beef Wellington rest before slicing and serving.

recipes.name: Ratatouille
recipes.description: Provençal vegetable stew with tomatoes, eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, and herbs.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a large baking dish, layer sliced tomatoes, eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, onion, and garlic.
Drizzle olive oil over the vegetables and sprinkle with dried thyme, dried basil, salt, and pepper.
Cover with foil and bake for 45 minutes.
Uncover and bake for an additional 15-20 minutes until vegetables are tender and lightly browned.
Serve hot as a side dish or with crusty bread.

recipes.name: Chicken Teriyaki
recipes.description: Japanese chicken dish with sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, served with steamed rice.
ingredients: 1/4 cup sake or dry white wine
Cooked rice and green onions for serving
instructions: In a bowl, combine soy sauce, mirin, sake, sugar, garlic, and ginger to make the teriyaki sauce.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add chicken breasts and cook until browned on both sides.
Pour teriyaki sauce over the chicken and bring to a simmer.
Reduce heat to medium-low and cook until chicken is cooked through and sauce thickens.
Slice chicken and serve over cooked rice.
Garnish with sliced green onions.

recipes.name: Gazpacho
recipes.description: Refreshing Spanish cold soup made with ripe tomatoes, cucumbers, bell peppers, and garlic.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
Fresh basil or parsley for garnish
instructions: In a blender, combine tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, onion, and garlic.
Add olive oil, red wine vinegar, and tomato juice.
Blend until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Chill gazpacho in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour before serving.
Serve cold garnished with fresh basil or parsley.

recipes.name: Pad Thai
recipes.description: Thai stir-fried noodles with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, and a tangy tamarind sauce.
instructions: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add shrimp, tofu, peanuts, garlic, and shallot. Stir fry until shrimp turns pink.
Push ingredients to one side of the skillet and pour beaten eggs into the other side.
Scramble eggs until cooked, then mix with other ingredients.
Add cooked rice noodles, tamarind paste, fish sauce, and sugar. Toss to combine.
Stir in bean sprouts and green onions.
Serve hot with lime wedges.

recipes.name: Steak Frites
recipes.description: French bistro classic with grilled steak and crispy French fries.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss potato fries with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Spread fries in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 30-35 minutes until crispy.
Meanwhile, season steaks with salt and pepper.
Grill steaks over high heat for 3-4 minutes per side for medium-rare.
Let steaks rest for a few minutes before slicing.
Serve steak with crispy fries, topped with butter and fresh parsley.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Creamy Italian rice dish with sautéed mushrooms, Parmesan cheese, and Arborio rice.
ingredients: 4 cups chicken or vegetable broth, warmed
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Sauté mushrooms until browned and tender. Remove from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, sauté onion and garlic until softened.
Add Arborio rice and cook for 2-3 minutes until translucent.
Pour in white wine and stir until absorbed.
Gradually add warmed broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring frequently until rice is creamy and tender, about 20 minutes.
Stir in sautéed mushrooms, Parmesan cheese, and butter.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot garnished with fresh parsley.
